directions: Place strawberries in a 1-qt. heatproof jar. Bring vinegar, sugar, salt, and 2/3 cup water to a boil in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring to dissolve sugar and salt. Pour over strawberries. Let cool; cover and chill.
Strawberries can be pickled 5 days ahead. Keep chilled.
ingredients: 1 pound ripe but firm strawberries, hulled, halved if large
title: Quick-Pickled Strawberries
